title: Argentina to Loosen Its Currency Policy and Build Reserves
description: Argentina loosened restrictions on currency trading and said it will start to rebuild foreign reserves, taking advantage of growing investor confidence in the President Javier Milei’s government to shore up its fragile finances.
content: Argentina loosened restrictions on currency trading and said it will start to rebuild foreign reserves, taking advantage of growing investor confidence in the President Javier Milei’s government to shore up its fragile finances.
